    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tangle of Battle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1622) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You critically hit an adjacent enemy.

</column>

---

Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe. Attempt to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the triggering enemy.
name: Tangle of Battle
